title: Album of Memories
detail_text: <:th_ch0102/>Hey, Ayumu-chan. What is it like to have a childhood friend?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Eh? What is it, all of a sudden....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Ah, sorry. I just read a book about two childhood friends, and I thought it must be really nice. That’s why I wanted to ask someone who actually has a childhood friend.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Fufufu, so that’s what it is. Let’s see.... It’s like having your album of memories be doubled in size, I guess?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Album of memories?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Yeah. They’re someone who remembers things that you don’t even remember yourself.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Waah.... That sounds lovely!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Ehehe.... But they remember embarrassing things too~. That might be a little.... inconvenient, maybe?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Fufu. That’s an enviable part too. It must be so nice....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Even if you aren’t friends with them from when you’re little, don’t you also have countless stuff in your album of memories right now, Riko-chan? I remember my memories with you, and everyone in Aqours surely remembers even more. Let’s keep increasing the count in our albums from now on, okay!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
